level.text: Substance abuse treatment program shall use standardized intake forms and standardized procedures for intake, assessment, and placement of patients approved by the Department.
The Department shall determine eligibility for participation in the DTCP at the conclusion of the intake and assessment process.

The Department shall inform a patient who is eligible for the DTCP of his or her right to select the substance abuse treatment program of his or her choice from the entire spectrum of certified substance abuse treatment programs in consultation with a qualified substance abuse counselor.
